name: DirtworkInsurance.com
description: Specialized insurance for excavation and dirtwork contractors

mainEntity.name: What types of businesses does dirtwork insurance cover?

acceptedAnswer.text: Dirtwork insurance covers excavation contractors, grading companies, site preparation contractors, foundation specialists, trenching businesses, and any other contractors involved in earthmoving operations.

mainEntity.name: How much does specialized excavation insurance cost?

acceptedAnswer.text: Excavation insurance costs vary based on business size, equipment value, project types, and coverage limits. Our customized policies typically save contractors 15-20% compared to standard construction policies while providing better coverage.

mainEntity.name: Does dirtwork insurance cover my heavy equipment?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, our comprehensive dirtwork insurance includes specialized equipment coverage for excavators, bulldozers, backhoes, loaders, and other heavy machinery, protecting against theft, damage, and breakdowns.
